name: Exposure of Version-Control Repository to an Unauthorized Control Sphere
description: The product stores a CVS, git, or other repository in a directory, archive, or other resource that is stored, transferred, or otherwise made accessible to unauthorized actors.

x_mitre_potential_mitigations.description: Recommendations include removing any CVS directories and repositories from the production server, disabling the use of remote CVS repositories, and ensuring that the latest CVS patches and version updates have been performed.
